Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Master() [1/2]

Master::Master ( DXLPortHandler &  port,
float  protocol_ver = 2.0,
uint16_t  malloc_buf_size = 256 
)

The constructor.

const int DXL_DIR_PIN = 2;
const float PROTOCOL_VER = 2.0;
DYNAMIXEL::SerialPortHandler dxl_port(Serial1, DXL_DIR_PIN);
DYNAMIXEL::Master dxl_master(dxl_port, PROTOCOL_VER);
Parameters
portThe DXLPortHandler instance you want to use on the board to communicate with DYNAMIXELs. It can be used not only for Serial but also for other communication port handlers like SerialPortHandler class.
protocol_verDYNAMIXEL protocol version used for communications. (default : 2.0)
